transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. 
Customer: Sir ye Radhaswami coal company se baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Ji aap kahan se bol rahe hain?
Customer: Sir main Tausif baat kar raha hun relationship manager IndiaMART se kaise hain aap?
Executive: Sab badhiya aap bataiye.
Customer: Achcha hun sir thank you so much puchne ke liye.
Executive: Sir aapka hamare kal executive se discussion hua hoga sir. 
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To aapke paas whatsapp pe ek feedback jata hai sir to usme aapne not satisfied mark kiya tha to uske regarding hi maine call kiya hai sir ki kya challenges face kar rahe hain ya kya issue aa raha hai sir uske regarding aapko.
Customer: Sir issue bas ek hi hai ki usme leads nahi mil rahi hai mujhe.
Executive: By leads nahi mil rahi hai aap ye keh rahe hain?
Customer: Haan ji. Matlab ek bhi order ek bhi selling IndiaMART ke through nahi hui hai meri.
Executive: Achcha aur aap mujhe ye batayiye use kaun karta hai aapke side se?
Customer: Main hi karta hun.
Executive: Aap hi karte hain sir. Main yahan pe dekh raha tha sir ki jaise bahut sari inquiries bhi aayi hui hai aur last kuch times mein aapne leads bhi consume kari hui hai to jab buyer se aapki baat hoti hai to kya bolte hain wo matlab kya discussion hota hai aapka kis reason ki wajah se wo aapki deal nahi ho paati hai?
Customer: Kuch call hi nahi aate to deal kaise ho payegi.
Executive: Calls to sir dekhiye buyers ki jo calls hoti hain abhi bhi last month to aapke paas panch calls aayi thi jisme se char aapne answer bhi kari hain aur is month abhi tak koi call nahi aayi hai lekin message ke through bahut sare buyers ne aapko inquiry kari hui hai jaise direct inquiry jo aapne.
Customer: Maine bhi dala hua hai lekin waise wo to message se fark nahi padta sir call se hi hota hai.
Executive: Sir dekhiye kya hota hai na matlab bahut se buyer jo hai ho sakta hai time issue ki wajah se call na kar paye lekin samne agar dekhte hain wo aur particular product mein interested hote hain to inquiry dalte hain.
Customer: Main aath mahine se use kar raha hun isko maine har tarike apna ke dekh chuke hain isme se kuch nahi ho raha hai. Theek hai agar jaise aap bolte ki main new sikha hun to aap mujhe sikha rahe hain is cheez ko to main samajhta lekin aath mahine se main use kar raha hun maine har cheez dekh liya call bhi kar liya message bhi kar liya sab kuch kar ke dekh liya lekin waise buyers ispe nahi aa rahe hain ya to in ya ispe aise aa rahe hain ki jinko knowledge chahiye theek hai wo knowledge leke chale ja rahe hain ya fir new comers hain theek hai us type ke ki ha bhaiya theek hai batate hain. Theek hai lekin jo proper jo buyers hai na wo nahi mil rahe hain yahan par mera Justdial mein bhi same chal raha hai Justdial mein samne se mujhe call aati hai theek hai wahan par turant baat hoti hai deal hoti hai aur selling bhi ho jati hai lekin isse kuch bhi nahi ho raha hai aur matlab meri ek vehicle bhi nahi nikli hai abhi tak coal ki.
Executive: Justdial ka to main aapko bataun kya hota hai ki usme to sir bas aapka ek mobile number mention rehta hai to buyer ke paas koi option nahi rehta hai.
Customer: Lekin wo kuch bhi wo kuch bhi ho sir mera kam to ho raha hai na wo jaise bhi chalae mera kam to ho raha hai na usse lekin isse to mera kuch bhi kam nahi hua.
Executive: Main aapko bataun sir yahan pe matlab ye jo hamara platform hai ek national level ka platform hai matlab Justdial agar aap dekh rahe honge to thoda sa locally aapki bhale hi deal ho jati hogi lekin IndiaMART pe sir all over India level se jo bhi buyers hote hain.
Customer: IndiaMART Justdial mein bhi main pan India ki hi baat kar raha hun main mera work hi pan India pe hai mera local deals nahi hoti hai meri.
Executive: Achcha to abhi sir ek last inquiry aayi thi aapke paas Korba se takriban 1000 tan ki aur inko.
Customer: Korba mein wo wo sir genuine buyer nahi tha wo meri baat hui thi unse.
Executive: Achcha direct inquiry pe.
Customer: Haan ji. Aap ek kam karo sir dekho main aapka ek cheez aur dekh raha hun jis wajah se mere khayal se aapki deal nahi ho rahi hai kyunki aapka jo catalog ka quality score hai aapne sir check kiya hai ki kabhi.
Customer: Catalog se koi relation nahi hai iska.
Executive: Nahi nahi of course hai sir aap dekho aapko product.
Customer: Nahi nahi maine kal wo dusre products ke liye hoga sir mere product ke liye nahi hai. Nahi baat yahan par bas agar yahan par aisa chahiye ki call hona chahiye aur number hona chahiye company ka naam nahi company ka naam nahi bhi hoga to chalega agar coal dealer hai number hai to usme utne mein hi deal ho jati hai kyunki baki kyunki usme brochure mein main har cheez nahi dal sakta jo baki agar koi knowledgeable banda hoga wo khali number se hi mujhe contact karega to jo baat hogi usi se hi deal ho payegi sir.
Executive: Baat aapki sahi hai sir but sahi keh raha hun ab ab dekho sir hota kya hai na isme ki ab dekho aapke Bilaspur paas mein hai ye location ek Bilaspur hai.
Customer: Bilaspur hi bol raha hun main.
Executive: Aapke paas nahi padta. Haan nahi Bilha se Bilha se GST registered hai to ab yahan pe do companiya aur hain jo Shri Balaji Global karke aur ek Shahban Ali transport services karke company.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji.
Executive: Jo matlab yahan pe IndiaMART se kafi time se hain aur inhone premium services bhi le rakhi hain IndiaMART se to isme inhone kya kar rakha hai sir main inka catalog dekh raha tha to inke catalog pe buyer ka ek achcha khasa traffic generate ho raha hai aur wo isi wajah se ho raha hai kyunki inhone matlab quality jo images ki quality ho gayi sir aur jo details mention kar rakhi hai bahut hi professional tarike se mention kar rakhi hai matlab offline mein to sir aap jaisa bhi business karte ho sir lekin aapke paas online mein to main catalog hi hota hai sir buyer ko dikhane ke liye ya buyer ko impress karne ke liye to agar hum apna catalog ka quality score ek achcha rakhenge sir to aap samjho ki koi bhi buyer aapke catalog pe aayega to aap samjho ki aise hi wo aadha convert ho jayega usko hamari team connect karegi aap ye batayiye aapne aath product add kar rakhe hain ab har ek product mein sir single single photo hai aur plus description kisi mein bhi nahi hai to sabse pehle main improve karaunga aapka catalog isme se jisme se mujhe aapke side se jo requirement hogi sir wo hogi photos ki jo coal ki photos hoti hai agar aap allow kijiye to main google se bhi download kar ke aake lagwa dunga agar aap allow karwaiye.
Customer: Haan bilkul theek hai wo kar karwa dijiye. Kyunki wo thoda sa professional wo high quality images hoti hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai abhi google se download kar lenge.
Customer: Haan wo bhi karte hain aur jo bhi specification hai jo chhoti chhoti details hai jaise description ho gaya to uska kya karna hai aap apne side se denge ki hum yahan se ek bar karwa le google se wo bhi download karwa le.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji kar sakte hain aap.
Executive: Jaise ye caloric value ho gayi sir GCV ho gaya ya ARB ho gaya ye sab steam coal ki product hai jo aapka iska gross caloric value kya hai sir?
Customer: Uss pe likha gaya hua hai ji 11 likha hua hai.
Executive: Ispe likha hai 250 mm Indian steam coil coal to isme jo hai aapka 5000 KCL se leke 4200 KCL tak hai.
Customer: 3500 3500 GCV dal dijiye.
Executive: 3500 KCL per kg right?
Customer: GCV.
Executive: GCV.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai aur original iska kahan hai sir India hi ka hai?
Customer: Haan ji India ka Bilaspur.
Executive: Theek hai aur meri team mein se aapko ek bar connect bhi karenge Mr. Abhinav jo aapka account manage kar rahe hain sir to kuch details aapko mangenge aur aaj video meeting schedule thi sir aapki hamari team ke sath to kis time isko schedule karwa de aap available.
Customer: Aaj nahi ho payegi aapko kal karwa dijiye usko.
Executive: Kal kitne baje karwa dun sir?
Customer: Kal yahi 1 baje ke aas pass.
Executive: Haan 1 baje ke karwa de raha hun aur aapke samne ye sari cheeze update karwa dunga main.
Customer: Haan ji okay.
Executive: Theek hai baki definitely ek experience hoga achcha aur aapka jaise concern tha to wo main matlab agar aap allow kijiye to main matlab yahan se sari catalog correction karwa ke close kar dunga to aapke paas hamari baat ka ek feedback bhi jayega sir to mail pe satisfied mark kar dijiyega sir agar sari cheeze sahi hai to.
Customer: Ji ji ji sir bilkul theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Ji thank you thank you so much for your time sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting enough leads through IndiaMART.

- No orders or sales through IndiaMART.

- Buyers are either seeking knowledge or new comers.

- Dissatisfied with the quality of leads.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to improve catalog quality.

- Executive will schedule a video meeting for tomorrow.

- Executive will update catalog details.



Next Steps: 

- Video meeting scheduled for tomorrow at 1 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, quality score, video meeting
